response.overview: Gauge is 5’8”, 240 lbs. Joey is 6’, 240 lbs. For fans of huge musclemen, BG has made a big leap into “Huge Muscleworship”. To BG, Gauge reminds him a little of Steve Sterling, only with 30 pounds more muscle. Put a mustache on Gauge and perhaps the resemblance might even be closer. This video opens with the two bodybuilders working out in a private gym in the Hollywood hills. The workout is a two-camera shoot. You’ll see BG’s camera work at the opening of the video, and the other camera’s work at the end of the video, as out-takes, or “after”-takes. Gauge and Joey were hot and sweaty by the time their workout ends, so they decide to take a shower. This has to be one of the sexiest showers BG has ever taped. Hard-on’s sprouted big time the moment they entered the enclosure. BG has to interrupt the proceedings before seed was spilled prematurely. The two go on to flex and pose, feel and caress. Bi’s are flexed and worshipped.
response.title: Mega Muscle Body Worship 1
